name: SKELLY ZONE
description:
Skelly Zone is a third person tower defense-ish game made for Ludum Dare 39 by Matt Mirrorfish.

If you participated in LD39 and have feedback I'd appreciate if you left a rating or comment on the LD page here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/skelly-zone

Collect skulls to build turrets, teleporters, cauldrons and barriers.

Shoot with left click.  Refuel turrets with skulls by right clicking.
Space toggles building mode.
